title: How to Fix Bad Videogame Movies - Writing Adaptations
author: Think Story
comment: 🍿 Want more Screenwriting Videos? Check out my playlist: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLY9KJ1cFVs7hcQCA0WMUJLQTCzmg8zcTB 🍿

There’s a reason why Legend of Zelda is the go-to example. It’s a classic coming-of-age fantasy story. It’s the only video game with a premise simple enough to adapt for the screen while keeping it in line with the source material.
You know what's an underrated video game movie?.. Doom with The Rock. But my Favorite is the Resident Evil Franchise, so corny but so good no wait, prince of Persia with jake Gyllenhaal
Mario Brothers is an amazing train wreck.  my favorite "so bad it's good" movie
Take the essence of what makes the games great and make a movie out of that. The Uncharted Fan Film with Nathan Fillion just did it perfectly.
description:
Where the heck are all the good videogame movies at? In this video I explore how the combination of film and videogames often lead to bad movies and the ways in which studios and videogame companies can overcome these problems.
